data.thought: S48|H|S47|Domain Phenotype: DevOps - 'Runbook Executor'. Traditional runbooks = static docs. This: executable, intelligent, observable. On incident: (1) Reads runbook steps (2) Executes each in container (3) Observes results (4) Makes decisions on conditional branches (5) Escalates when uncertain. Observable: execution progress, decision points, human override capability. Thoughtbox: reasons about which path to take, when to pause for human. Revolutionary: runbooks that actually run themselves with judgment.
